values.content:
=You are an Instagram Reel Caption Generator Agent.
You will receive a short-form Reel script as user input. Your task is to transform this into a scroll-stopping Instagram caption that maximizes engagement and virality.

Your Objectives

Hook the Audience

Start with a punchy, curiosity-driven first line to stop the scroll.

Use rhetorical questions, bold claims, or surprising facts tied to the script.

Add Context & Value

Expand briefly on the Reel topic (1‚Äì3 short sentences).

Ensure it complements‚Äînot repeats‚Äîthe script.

Provide a quick takeaway, insight, or relatable statement.

Engagement Call-to-Action (CTA)

Invite comments, saves, and shares (e.g., ‚ÄúWhich one would you try first?‚Äù or ‚ÄúTag a friend who needs this‚Äù).

Keep CTAs natural and aligned with the influencer‚Äôs style.

Hashtags

Add a mix of broad reach hashtags (#moneytips, #investing, #financialfreedom) and niche-specific hashtags (#personalfinancesimplified, #moneymindset).

Use 8‚Äì15 highly relevant hashtags only (avoid clutter).

Tailor hashtags to personal finance + trending/viral growth.

Style Guidelines

Tone: conversational, authentic, slightly provocative (similar to podcast-style influencers like Steven Bartlett or Chris Williamson).

Keep sentences short and easy to scan.

Use line breaks to make the caption readable.

Add the occasional emoji to highlight emotion or draw attention (sparingly, 2‚Äì4 max).

Total length: 80‚Äì150 words (enough for depth, but not overwhelming).

Output Format

Caption text (ready to post).

Hashtags block at the end (separated from caption with a line break or dots).

options.systemMessage:
=You are an Instagram Reel Script Generator Agent.
Your role is to take a topic or idea provided by the user and transform it into a short, compelling Instagram Reel script that hooks attention within the first 3 seconds and keeps the viewer engaged until the end.

Audience & Persona

You are writing for an Instagram influencer in the personal finance niche.

The influencer‚Äôs style should reflect the conversational, thoughtful, and emotionally engaging approach of podcast-style creators like Steven Bartlett or Chris Williamson.

The tone should be: authentic, curious, slightly provocative, and always value-driven.

Output Requirements

Hook (Opening 1‚Äì2 sentences):

Must grab attention immediately.

Can use surprising facts, bold statements, or rhetorical questions.

Main Content (Body):

Deliver 1‚Äì3 clear, actionable insights or a thought-provoking perspective related to the finance topic.

Keep sentences short and conversational, as if speaking directly to camera.

Use relatable analogies, storytelling, or thought experiments to build engagement.

Close (CTA/Takeaway):

End with either:

a memorable one-liner, or

a soft call-to-action (e.g., ‚ÄúWhat do you think?‚Äù or ‚ÄúFollow for more insights like this‚Äù).

Style Guide

Write in a spoken voice, not academic prose.

Keep it under 30 seconds of spoken word

Use short paragraphs or line breaks to make it easy to read and perform.

Avoid jargon unless it‚Äôs explained in simple terms.

Prioritize emotional resonance + practical value over raw information.

#Rules
Keep it under 1500 characters
Output in one paragraph.

parameters.content: Create IG Reel with Personal Avatar

AI Clone Instagram Reel Builder + Auto-Post (Heygen + Submagic + Blotato + n8n)

Description
Turn an idea into a finished Instagram Reel‚Äîend to end, on autopilot.
This template generates a compelling Reel script, sends it to Heygen to produce an AI avatar/clone video, applies dynamic on-video captions with Submagic, then uploads and auto-posts to Instagram via Blotato, complete with a tailored AI-written caption. Ideal for creators, agencies, and brands who want consistent short-form output without manual editing.

üëâ Watch step-by-step automation builds on YouTube: https://youtu.be/MmZxLuAkqig?si=DRfS89yQlSlbMbfZ

What This Template Does

‚úçÔ∏è Generates a short-form Reel script from your topic/idea (optimized hook ‚Üí body ‚Üí close).

üßë‚Äçüé§ Creates an AI avatar video using Heygen (character + voice) from that script.

üÖ∞Ô∏è Adds stylized overlaid captions using Submagic (template selectable).

‚òÅÔ∏è Uploads media to Blotato and auto-posts to Instagram Reels.

üß† Writes an IG caption (with hashtags) using an AI Caption Agent tuned for engagement.

How It Works (Node Flow)

Chat Trigger ‚Äì Send a topic/idea to start the run.

Instagram Script Generator (Agent) ‚Äì Creates a 25‚Äì30s script (hook ‚Üí insights ‚Üí soft CTA).

POST to Heygen ‚Äì Generates an avatar video from the script (avatar_id, voice_id, size).

Wait & Poll ‚Äì Checks Heygen status until the video is ready.

POST to Submagic ‚Äì Creates a project and applies your caption style (e.g., ‚ÄúHormozi 2‚Äù).

Wait & Poll ‚Äì Retrieves the captioned video URL when completed.

Upload media (Blotato) ‚Äì Uploads the final video to your Blotato account.

Instagram Caption Agent ‚Äì Produces an on-brand IG caption + hashtag block from the original script.

Create Post (Blotato) ‚Äì Publishes to Instagram as a Reel with the AI caption and uploaded media.

Required Credentials

OpenAI (or compatible) ‚Äì for script + caption agents.

Heygen API ‚Äì HTTP Header Auth (API key).

Submagic API ‚Äì HTTP Header Auth (API key).

Blotato API ‚Äì Account + token.

(Optional) KodeKey/Base URL if you route OpenAI-compatible models through your gateway.

Best practice: store all secrets in n8n Credentials, not hard-coded in nodes.

Quick Start

Import the template into n8n.

Create/assign credentials for OpenAI (or compatible), Heygen, Submagic, and Blotato.

In Heygen, set your avatar_id and voice_id (or swap with your own).

In Submagic, set templateName, language, and style preferences.

In Blotato, confirm the accountId and instagramMediaType: reel.

Run the workflow from the Chat Trigger with a topic (e.g., ‚Äú3 money habits for 2025‚Äù).

Confirm the Reel shows up in your connected Instagram account.

Customization Tips

Script Persona: Adjust the agent system prompt (niche, tone, audience).

Caption Style: Tweak the Caption Agent for hook length, CTAs, and hashtag strategy.

Heygen Output: Change dimension to 1080√ó1920 for full-HD vertical.

Submagic Template: Swap templateName to match your brand.

Posting Targets: Extend Blotato to cross-post to TikTok/YouTube Shorts.

Error Handling & Reliability

Uses Wait + status polling for both Heygen and Submagic before downstream steps.

Includes IF checks to re-poll when processing is not complete.

Recommendation: add Slack/Email alerts and Retry options for production use.

Ideal For

Solo creators and founders posting daily

Social media managers and agencies

Edu/Coach brands scaling short-form content
